p: Studies with Mesosphaerum oblongifolium (syn. Hyptis oblongifolia) led to the isolation of four new compounds of this class, 4-deacetoxy-10- epi-olguine ( 163), 6 R-[5 R,6 S-(diacetyloxy)-1 R-(hydroxy)-2 R-(methoxy)-3 E-heptenyl]-5,6-dihydro-2H-pyran-2-one ( 164), 6 R-[5 R,6 S-(diacetyloxy)-1 S,2 R)-(dihydroxy)-3 E-heptenyl]-5,6-dihydro-2H-pyran-2-one ( 165) and 6 R-[1 R,2 R,5 R,6 S-(tetracetyloxy)-3 E-heptenyl-5,6-dihydro-2H-pyran-2-one ( 166) ( Pereda-Miranda and Delgado, 1990). From Mesosphaerum urticoides (syn. Hyptis urticoides) the compound hypurticin ( 167) was isolated ( de Vivar et al., 1991).
